title: Google Pixel didn't come with USB - Google SCUMBAGS!!
content:
I'll cut to the chase: Google didn't give me a USB charging cable, like everyone else. So is the intent with Google to turn into the next Apple? Making needless changes just so I have to keep buying adapters and special cables? That is the entire reason I do not use Apple. If you buy one of their products, you have entered into a lifetime contract of buying only their stupid products.

I'm just so angry that I have to wait an hour to charge my phone at home, because my USB car charger is USB... 

I understand that new formats are made by these mega corporations. But to give me a male/female USB ADAPTER, but not a male/female USB CABLE is fucking ridiculous. 

I've loved Google until now for always being the SENSIBLE option compared to Apple. But I guess fuck me. i guess i'll always be a fucking prisoner to this bullshit corporate fuck-fuck games
i hate this fkn planet
